@package unison-codebase-sqlite-hashing-v2
@version 0.0.0


module Unison.Hashing.V2.Convert2
v2ToH2Term :: forall v. Ord v => Hash -> Term (F v) v () -> Term v ()
v2ToH2Type :: forall v. Ord v => TypeR TypeRef v -> Type v ()
v2ToH2TypeD :: forall v. Ord v => Hash -> TypeD v -> Type v ()
h2ToV2Reference :: Reference -> Reference

module U.Codebase.Sqlite.V2.HashHandle
v2HashHandle :: HashHandle

module U.Codebase.Sqlite.V2.Term
saveTermComponent :: Maybe ByteString -> Hash -> [(Term Symbol, Type Symbol)] -> Transaction ObjectId

module U.Codebase.Sqlite.V2.SyncEntity
saveSyncEntity :: Hash32 -> SyncEntity -> Transaction (Either CausalHashId ObjectId)

module U.Codebase.Sqlite.V2.Decl
saveDeclComponent :: Maybe ByteString -> Hash -> [Decl Symbol] -> Transaction ObjectId
